entry.title: Ruthie Belle - Cleaning 11
entry.summary:
Vendor: RUTHIE BELLE
Type: Aftercare
Price: 48.00

Clean 11 Concentrate makes a high-quality pH balanced purifying foam that removes all makeup from the face and eyes, including waterproof mascara. The foam was initially invented for professional lash and brow artists, but is now available for home use. It can be used daily and is compatible with eyelash extensions.

- Removes all makeup, including waterproof mascara
- Suitable for eyes and entire face
- Compatible with eyelash extensions
- Produces foam that does not dehydrate lashes and skin
- Contains tea tree oil
- Helps prevent inflammation of the eyelids
- Suitable for professional and home use
 

HOW IT WORKS

Ruthie Belle Eyeliner was developed specifically to be compatible with eyelash extension wearers and does not affect adhesive bonds. It creates a defined and deep black line that stays on well, but does not contain nano carbon black, the smallest and most popular carbon black that is used in cosmetic products. The smaller the carbon black particles that are used to make eyeliners black, the quicker they enter the human body, which can lead to irritation. The lack of nano carbon black makes this eyeliner suitable for even very sensitive eyes.
 

HOW TO USE

NB: Only to be used diluted!
- Dilute 4ml of Clean 11 Concentrate per 60ml foamer with distilled water and 10ml of Clean 11 Concentrate per 170ml foamer with distilled water (empty foamers are available in our online shop)
- Apply foam and let it soak for 30 seconds
- Remove all eye makeup, including waterproof mascara
You can also use the foam made from Clean 11 Concentrate to remove makeup residue from eyelash extensions after applying eye makeup. Just use a tiny bit of foam on a mascara brush and brush through lashes until residue is gone. No need to rinse afterwards.
 

PROFESSIONAL USE

NB: Only to be used diluted!
- Dilute Clean 11 Concentrate with 0.9% saline solution to make foam
- Apply foam and let it soak for 30 seconds
- Remove all eye makeup, including waterproof mascara
 

INGREDIENTS

Aqua, PEG-40 Glyceryl Cocoate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Coceth Sulfate, Chlorphenesin, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Limonene

entry.title: Amaterasu Eyeliner - Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: CARTEL LASH & SUPPLY CO
Type: Aftercare
Price: 30.00

If you are looking for THE Liquid Eyeliner (formerly 'The Geisha Liner'), that does it all, look no further! Amaterasu’s Liquid Eyeliner will not disappoint. The brush is meticulously hand assembled in Japan, using only the best quality microfibre that will not fray. It is known as the ultimate brush tip for perfect application in the makeup industry.

Even newbies or those with super unsteady hands can easily create the most polished looks with this eyeliner. If you think only makeup artists can help you achieve perfectly lined eyes, think again! This eyeliner is a game changer.

The other key feature of this eyeliner is in its staying power. Brand Creator Sara Au Yeong tested the eyeliner in every possible condition where it might smudge: the shower, massages, workouts, and on her trips to Asia in over 40 degree Celsius weather. It stays on beautifully every time. Some of our clients even took it on camping trips where this product earned its nickname "The 24-hour Eyeliner."

At Amaterasu, we believe purity is just as important as performance so we have continued to perfect this formula; even the most sensitive individuals can wear it. As with all Amaterasu makeup, this Liquid Eyeliner is paraben-free and phthalate-free. The clean ingredients and unique formulation ensures that you can use these products with peace of mind.

Weight: 0.6 ml / 0.02 fl oz

  • Waterproof
  • Smudge-proof
  • Micro-fiber Tip Brush
  • 24 hour formula
  • Paraben and Phthalate Free

entry.title: LBLA Fiber Prep
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Liquids
Price: 32.80

Our new Fiber Prep is an extra step you can take to improve lash extension attachment to the natural lash, and prepare fiber for receiving glue. Fiber prep takes care of any possible dust, oils, or residues on false lashes that may affect retention. It creates a perfect bond from the false lash to the natural lash surface. 

To use simply apply small amount of Fiber Prep with a micro swab onto the base of the lash extensions on the strip, then create your set as usual.  For use on false lashes only, NOT for use on natural lashes.  Do not saturate lashes on the trip with Fiber Prep.

Type: Adhesive
Price: 25.00

LASHGOD MAGNETIC BOND 🧲 

 

INNOVATION, a vegan, cruelty-free, alcohol-free

For professional use only.

entry.title: SUGARLASH Matte Prep +
entry.summary:
Vendor: SUGARLASH
Type: Liquids
Price: 33.00

DESCRIPTION

PERFECTLY PREPPED AND PRIMED. MATTE PREP+ PREPARES YOUR CLIENT’S NATURAL LASHES BY REMOVING EXCESS OILS AND RESIDUE ON THE EYELASHES. THIS SUGARLASH PRO SOLUTION HELPS TO EFFECTIVELY BOND EXTENSIONS TO THE NATURAL LASH, CREATING CLEAN SETS EVERY TIME.

30ML

DIRECTIONS:

AFTER CLEANSING YOUR CLIENT’S NATURAL LASHES, WET A LINT FREE FLOCKED APPLICATOR WITH MATTE PREP +. TAKE ANOTHER DRY LINT FREE FLOCKED APPLICATOR AND RUB THE TWO TOGETHER. THIS WILL PREVENT OVER-SATURATION OF THE SOLUTION WHICH CAN CAUSE POOR RETENTION OR ALLOW EXCESS SOLUTION TO RUN INTO THE EYE. GENTLY BRUSH OVER THE NATURAL LASHES WITH THE TWO APPLICATORS. DO NOT RINSE.

+ THE PH LEVEL OF MATTE PREP+ ENSURES IT IS EYE-FRIENDLY. 

+ DEGREASES THE LASHES.

+ CONTAINS WITCH HAZEL WHICH HAS ANTI-INFLAMMATORY PROPERTIES, REMOVES EXCESS OIL, PREVENTS HAIR LOSS, AND PROTECTS THE ROOT OF THE EYELASHES.

STORE AND USE

STORE: KEEP ADHESIVES IN AN AIRTIGHT CONTAINER WITH DRY RICE (OR SILICA PACK). ROOM TEMPERATURE. DO NOT STORE IN THE FRIDGE.

 

USE: ALL ADHESIVES SHOULD BE SHAKEN FOR 3 MINUTES PRIOR TO USE. THE NOZZLE COMES SEALED ON ALL FLAWLESS BOND ADHESIVE BOTTLES, AND MUST BE PIERCED TO DISPENSE. ISOLATE NATURAL LASH BEFORE PICKING UP OR DIPPING EXTENSION. ONCE ISOLATED, DIP 2-3MM (CLASSIC LASHING) OR 1-2MM (VOLUME LASHING) AND BRING RIGHT TO THE NATURAL LASH. DO NOT SHIMMY OR "PAINT" THE NATURAL LASH WITH THE ADHESIVE. SIMPLY PRESS THIS ADHESIVE TO THE NATURAL LASH BASE AND HOLD FOR ONE SECOND.

entry.title: SUGARLASH Curator
entry.summary:
Vendor: SUGARLASH
Type: Liquids
Price: 52.00

DESCRIPTION

NO MATTER THE ADHESIVE YOU USE OR CLIMATE CONDITIONS YOU FACE, WE’VE GOT THE CURE. THE CURATOR HELPS EVERY ADHESIVE CURE PROPERLY IN PARTICULARLY VOLATILE TEMPERATURE AND HUMIDITY LEVELS, AMPLIFYING BONDS EVEN IN LESS-THAN-IDEAL CONDITIONS.

30ML

DIRECTIONS:

WAIT 1-2 MINUTES POST-APPLICATION BEFORE APPLYING. MOISTEN A FLOCKED APPLICATOR OR MICRO BRUSH AND  APPLY DIRECTLY TO THE EXTENSION BONDS. THE MICRO BRUSH OR FLOCKED APPLICATOR SHOULD BE DAMP AND NOT SOAKED WITH PRODUCT BEFORE APPLYING. ALLOW TO DRY.

+ CURES THE ADHESIVE BONDS THAT HAVE BEEN PLACED ON THE NATURAL LASH FASTER

+ MAY HELP TO PREVENT SENSITIVITIES AND IRRITATION BY ADHESIVE THAT IS TAKING LONGER TO CURE/SET. 

+ WILL ASSIST WHEN THE ENVIRONMENT, TEMPERATURE, OR HUMIDITY ARE NOT IDEAL FOR THE ADHESIVE AND ACCELERATE THE CURING PROCESS.

STORE AND USE

STORE: KEEP ADHESIVES IN AN AIRTIGHT CONTAINER WITH DRY RICE (OR SILICA PACK). ROOM TEMPERATURE. DO NOT STORE IN THE FRIDGE.

 

USE: ALL ADHESIVES SHOULD BE SHAKEN FOR 3 MINUTES PRIOR TO USE. THE NOZZLE COMES SEALED ON ALL FLAWLESS BOND ADHESIVE BOTTLES, AND MUST BE PIERCED TO DISPENSE. ISOLATE NATURAL LASH BEFORE PICKING UP OR DIPPING EXTENSION. ONCE ISOLATED, DIP 2-3MM (CLASSIC LASHING) OR 1-2MM (VOLUME LASHING) AND BRING RIGHT TO THE NATURAL LASH. DO NOT SHIMMY OR "PAINT" THE NATURAL LASH WITH THE ADHESIVE. SIMPLY PRESS THIS ADHESIVE TO THE NATURAL LASH BASE AND HOLD FOR ONE SECOND.

entry.title: Untamed Artistry - Hold Up Adhesive
entry.summary:
Vendor: UNTAMED ARTISTRY
Type: Adhesive
Price: 55.00

HOLD UP 🖤 An adhesive made for the hotter summer months or the newer lash artists. With a 2 - 3 second dry time, this adhesive will work perfectly for beginner lash artists. The slower dry time will also work for a hotter and more humid environment. Turning this 2.5 sec dry time adhesive into a perfect 1 sec dry time. A great summer alternative when your Retention/Invisible Ink is drying too fast.

 
Characteristics:

☑️ Black
☑️ Thin viscosity
☑️ Low Fume
Ideal Environment: 
🌡️ 20C/68F - 24C/75F 
🌡️ 30% - 60% Humidity 
🌡️ 2 - 3 second dry time
 
Dry Time: 
🔥 Varies with environment 
🔥 Lower humidity/temperature: slower drying 
🔥 Higher humidity/temperature: faster drying 
🔥 Dry time also varies with glue pick up amount 
🔥 Dry time also varies with application speed 
🔥 Dry time also varies with dimension of the fan
 
Storage: 
📦 Unopened adhesive can be stored in the fridge for up to 5 months. 
📦 Opened adhesive should be stored in an adhesive container in a DRY, COOL AND DARK place with silica or rice.
📦 Replace your opened adhesive every 4 weeks.
 
❗️Using any lash extensions adhesive under 30% humidity is not recommended! This will cause more irritation for clients and artists.

entry.title: Borboleta Lash Bath - Travel Gel Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: BORBOLETA
Type: Aftercare
Price: 15.00

Custom all new formulas keep lids and lashes clean, healthy and nourished. Formulated with targeted ingredients like moisture-binding hyaluronic acid and amino acids to replenish and hydrate for more youthful looking skin while strengthening and conditioning natural lashes. 

 

Use once daily for best results.

Use to clean pre-application and to break down fumes and remove residue post-application. 

Size: 15ml / .05 fl oz 

 

DIRECTIONS: Dispense a dime sized amount of Lash Bath Gel into palm of hand. Wet Borboleta Clean Swoop Brush and swirl to create a lather. Apply to lids and gently brush through lashes. To finish, use Clean Swoop to rinse lids and lashes with water. Pat dry.

entry.title: LBLA Fluff Guard
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Liquids
Price: 35.00

Refreshing eyelash extension cleanser keeps your lashes fluffy and clean at all times. Great way to clean your lashes after make-up and before professional lash application. This oil-free formula, absorbs oils and maintains fluffy volume for mega volume lashes. Perfect for everyday use at home or professionally. 

1.7 fl.oz/50ml

 

How To Use:

For in home use or on the go, spritz solution on your Unicorn Duo Brush or your Teal Bristle Wand and start at the base of the lashes and comb upwards to the tips of your lashes. No need to rinse or pat dry. 

For professional use, spritz solution on your Unicorn Cleansing Brush or with a micro-swab starting at the base of the lashes to the tips of the lashes. Pat dry with a lint free cloth.

How is Fluff Guard different from Lash Shampoo ?

Fluff guard is a specially formulated solution to clean lashes from oil, protein, or eyeshadow residue. It is not a make up remover. We recommend this solution to clean lashes of residue OR, if yours fans are not fluffy anymore due to cosmetics, use Fluff Guard around your eye area. This solution does NOT need to be rinsed or dried.

We recommend you use it before lash application to clean your lashes from proteins & oils the could prohibit your extensions from staying. It can remove small amounts of makeup ... but for complete makeup; we recommend Bubble Lash Shampoo.

Bubble Lash Shampoo is a complete lash AND eye make up remover. It’s a cleanser for skin around the eyes. It is in foam formula and needs to be rinsed and pat dry.

When these products are used in tandem, your retention will be all it can be!

entry.title: LBLA Superhero Adhesive (5ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHBOXLA
Type: Adhesive
Price: 99.00

This SUPERHERO glue bonds lashes up to 8 weeks! Very thin consistency and rapid dry makes Volume Lashing so much easier. This glue has the best retention on the market and significantly helps to reduce time and amount of work with your touch-ups.

This adhesive works best in humidity between 25%-45%(Recommended 40%) and temperature 60-73 degrees. For humid climates or in the summer may require a professional dehumidifier. Recommended for dryer climates.

  • Drying time - 0.5-1 second
  • Retention - 8 weeks
  • Viscosity - very thin
  • Color - seamless black
  • Minimum fumes
  • Flexible structure

Available in 5ml bottle

Use with in 30 days after opening.

CAUTION !

Glue is recommended only for advance artists who isolate lashes perfectly and work very fast.  

For professional use only. Esthetician license required to use this adhesive.

Please choose wisely open adhesive can not be returned or refunded.

Shake vigorously for 1 min before each use.

Proper use instructions: 

 

  • DO NOT APPLY GLUE ON SKIN!  
  • Adhesive can not touch skin at any time. 
  • Product can be used only on completely closed eyes throughout application. 
  • Use under eye gel patches or medical foam tape to minimize fumes
  • Be mindful that lash extension adhesive fumes may cause an allergic reaction to certain people.
  • Client Information Consent Form is required before first lash extension application.  
  • Patch test is required before using this product.
  • Patch test should be performed for all new clients and every time different adhesive is used for application. (different adhesives has different % of ingredients.
  • Be mindful that It is possible to develop sensitivity to adhesive with time. 
  • Read instruction on the back of the label before using

entry.title: Protein Cleansing Remover Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: MAX2LASH
Type: Liquids
Price: 25.00

Product Highlights:

 

The protein remover is used to prep and disinfect the lashes.

Designed to remove residual cosmetics and natural oils, our Primer will cleanse and prepare the lashes for maximum bonding of the adhesive.

As the adhesive will bond faster, overall application time will be reduced.

Primer can be used on natural or extended lashes making it ideal for both initial application and touch-ups.

Our Primer will not affect any existing eyelashes extensions bonds.

How to use: 

Client’s eyes should be closed when applying primer, do not apply directly on the eyes.

Hold flat cotton pad under lashes to catch excess primer.

Squeeze a few drops or one spray of primer on a small to medium makeup brush.

Brush primer on lashes, drying time is approximately 2 seconds.

Dry lashes thoroughly with an air-blower or fan before applying eyelash extensions as usual

Disclaimer: 

  • We recommend that you keep the primer in refrigerator or somewhere cooler than room temperature for a longer storage life.
  • If the primer is kept in a refrigerator, it is required to be left out for about 1 to 2 hours before use.
  • For advanced technicians only. Do not use on yourself.
  • We are not responsible for the misuse of the primer.
  • You are solely responsible for the product once you purchase it from us. Performance and results of the primer vary from person to person.

entry.title: Keratin Lash Shampoo (Bath)
entry.summary:
Vendor: MAX2LASH
Type: Aftercare
Price: 30.00

Great Keratin Lash Foam ﻿Effectively removes dirt, oil, and make-up, including waterproof eye make-up without any harsh soaps or oils that can sting or irritate the sensitive eye area. It rinses completely clean and won't leave any pore-clogging residue. Contains Keratin and Panthenol, which provide superb skin conditioning. This elegant formulation was designed for both professional and individual users.

How to use: 

1. Gently shake the bottle several times before opening.

2. Massage a pea size amount onto the eye area, including eyelids and eyelashes. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

3. Rinse thoroughly 5-6 times and pat dry.

entry.title: Eyelash Maker - Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: EYELASH MAKER
Type: Liquids
Price: 40.00

Eyelash Cleanser

    • Perfectly removes dirt, oil and protein on lashes.
    • Doesn't irritate sensitive eyes.
    • Helps glue dry quickly.
    • Makes lash extensions last longer.
    • Cleansing is very important step in every eyelash extension.
